review: I had met the doctor and it was for health problem. The doctor was very helpful. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.  I took reports with me to doctor. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am more satisfied with the treatment given. There was no waiting time when I went. It was normal, first come first serve basis. Good OPD - Hospitality. I am fine. Diet and exercise was suggested by the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent understanding of the problem and treatment prescribed is off a very high standard. I will highly recommend him to other patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: He don‚Äôt listen to patients carefully . He gave medicine to my mother which created new health issues. We are seeing another senior doctor now, *** ******* **** *** ***** **** **** ***** ******** ******* ****** *** *** ** ***** ***** My mom had high blood pressure but after having the medicine the next day onwards she felt drowsy but when we told the same to doc he told its normal!!! Now after two months when it is not getting cured we went to the senior most doc *** ** **** ** ***** ********* ** * ***** ****

I visited doctor for my mother in the year 2020 as she was facing problem in her heart.  As advice my sir we followed all the instructions and now my mother is doing well. I will strongly recommend to each and every one who really wants to know the exact problem of his/her heart. No fabrication straight and simple advice.

Confident doctor üëçRight diagnosis without even reports ‚úåÔ∏èI went to show him  without any feedback .After taking  the first prescribed medicines, I thanked God for sending me to the No 1 cardiologist . Now I am under him for more than a year. üôè Really happy üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Frankly speaking  I  rarely  saw  a  smiling Doctor who  is  having  patience  to  hear  patients problem & difficulty for  which he / she  has  come . 
Carefully listening case history  and verifying  previous reports  and  prescription and  then Dr Hazra personally examine the patient . 
No doubt,  every patient and their relatives expect from a Doctor. 
I am very much satisfied with Dr  Hazra .
Nice experience. Some of the acute problems of my mother got resolved & she had got rid off that .We are happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is an amazing doctor. His words have almost cured me. His presence gives an assurance of relief and an inner strength.
Nice üëç Doctor. Confident and very much experience. His behaviour to the patient is good. Nice doctor üôÇ.
